summary: Cancelling an async workflow closure with an internal timer doesn't properly cancel the timer, causing the workflow to hang indefinitely instead of finishing.
userImpact: Workflows with internal timers cannot be properly cancelled, leaving them in a hung state and blocking workflow completion.
rootCause: The cancellation signal is not propagated to internal timers when an async closure is cancelled.
keyQuote: Expect the timer to be cancelled and workflow to be finished. Instead the workflow hangs and endlessly waits.
